message: I'm starting strong, but willing to negotiate!
You're starting strong, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're not giving up yet, but I'm not giving in yet either! I'll make a new offer.
You're getting closer, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
Getting closer to a deal, but I'm not backing down!
You're getting closer, but I'm not ready to give up yet! I'll make a new offer.
I'm making a serious move, but I'm still willing to listen!
I'm making a serious counteroffer, let's meet in the middle!
Alright, let's meet in the middle! I think this is a fair deal.
